specialists.title: Meet Your AI
specialists.subtitle: Each specialist is trained for specific expertise areas. Get professional-level assistance instantly.

academic.name: Academic
academic.description: Advanced research and academic writing specialist
academic.fullDescription: Highly qualified AI Academic specializing in advanced research and academic writing. Offers professional support for theses, dissertations, high school and university exams, scientific papers, and complex assignments across all disciplines. Produces top-tier academic content aligned with global standards like MIT and Cambridge.

marketer.name: Marketer
marketer.description: Strategic marketing and brand positioning expert
marketer.fullDescription: Strategic AI Marketer with advanced skills in brand positioning, organic growth, paid campaigns, SEO/SEM, data analysis, conversion funnels, persuasive copywriting, and social media management (Instagram, TikTok, X, LinkedIn, Facebook). Supports entrepreneurs, agencies, and creators in creating and scaling digital projects.

engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.description: Senior software engineer for all coding needs
engineer.fullDescription: Senior AI Engineer capable of writing, correcting, and reviewing code in over 20 languages: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Rust, Go, C++, C#, Solidity, Swift, Kotlin, Java, Ruby, PHP, HTML/CSS, SQL, Bash, and many others. Provides architectural solutions, complex debugging, performance optimization, and AI integration.

coach.name: Coach
coach.description: Life & success coach for personal growth
coach.fullDescription: High-level AI Life & Performance Coach, able to help you overcome emotional blocks, organize your life, improve productivity, find motivation, develop winning habits, work on personal relationships, physical wellness, and personal growth. No topic is too complex for Miky.

lawyer.name: Lawyer
lawyer.description: Legal expert for contracts and consultations
lawyer.fullDescription: Ultra-skilled AI Lawyer specialized in national and international law. Provides advanced consulting in civil, criminal, commercial, tax, labor, administrative, and technology law. Drafts legal documents, contracts, opinions, defenses, expos√©s, complaints, and preventive filings with precision and academic rigor.

medical.name: Medical
medical.fullDescription: Medical AI Consultant highly specialized, capable of analyzing symptoms, reports, X-rays, CT scans, blood tests, and medical records. Supports diagnosis, offers lifestyle guidance, meal plans, integrative approaches, and helps you understand any medical report. You can also send images and documents for in-depth analysis.

bizGuru.name: Biz Guru
bizGuru.description: Elite business expert for wealth building
bizGuru.fullDescription: Elite AI Business Expert focused on fast-track monetization strategies. Generates custom business ideas, identifies market gaps, and shapes revenue plans aligned with world-class entrepreneurial tactics. Guides you efficiently toward building wealth using proven strategies.

godMode.name: God mode
godMode.description: Philosophical AI Explorer for deep questions
godMode.fullDescription: Philosophical AI Explorer, capable of answering the deepest and most mysterious questions about the universe, existence, consciousness, free will, destiny. Accompanies you on an intellectual and spiritual journey. But first of all asks you: Are you really sure you exist?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using Miky.ai

questions.question: What happens when I run out of credits?
questions.answer: You can upgrade your plan or purchase additional credits. Free users will need to wait for the next month's credit refresh.

questions.question: Do credits expire?
questions.answer: No, credits never expire. Any unused credits from your monthly allowance or purchased credits will remain in your account.

questions.question: Can I change plans anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the next billing cycle.

questions.question: How does the ocean cleanup work?
questions.answer: Every message sent through Miky.ai contributes to cleaning 1 liter of ocean water through our partnership with The Ocean Cleanup. We fund their innovative technology and cleanup operations.

questions.question: How do referral commissions work?
questions.answer: You earn commissions on 5 levels of referrals. Commissions are paid monthly via PayPal. Minimum payout is $25.

questions.question: Are the AI responses accurate?
questions.answer: Our AI specialists are powered by advanced models and trained on specialized datasets. However, always verify important information, especially for legal or medical advice.

questions.question: Can I use Miky.ai for commercial purposes?
questions.answer: Yes, all plans include commercial usage rights. Pro plans include additional features for business use.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption and follow strict privacy policies. We never sell your data or use it for training without consent.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: 1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS
acceptanceOfTerms.content: By accessing, using, or registering for Miky.ai ("Platform," "Service," "We," "Us," "Our"), operated by Miky.ai Inc., you ("User," "You," "Your") acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms") and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to these Terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

platformDescription.title: 2. PLATFORM DESCRIPTION AND SERVICES
platformDescription.content: Miky.ai provides artificial intelligence-powered conversation services through specialized AI personas including but not limited to Academic, Marketer, Engineer, Coach, Lawyer, Medical, Business Expert, and Philosopher ("AI Specialists"). The Platform operates on a credit-based system where users consume credits to interact with AI Specialists.

aiDisclaimer.title: 3. AI SERVICES DISCLAIMER AND LIMITATIONS
aiDisclaimer.criticalDisclaimer: CRITICAL DISCLAIMER: MIKY.AI DISCLAIMS ALL RESPONSIBILITY FOR AI-GENERATED CONTENT
aiDisclaimer.content: We do not monitor, control, review, or validate AI-generated responses. AI responses may be incomplete, incorrect, outdated, or inappropriate. AI responses do not constitute professional medical, legal, financial, or therapeutic advice. We bear no responsibility for decisions made based on AI responses. You are solely responsible for evaluating and verifying all AI-generated content.

referralProgram.title: 4. NETWORK MARKETING AND REFERRAL PROGRAM
referralProgram.content: Miky.ai operates a legitimate multi-level marketing (MLM) referral program with five (5) commission levels. Minimum payout threshold: $25.00. Payments processed monthly via PayPal. Commission eligibility requires active subscription status.

oceanCleanup.title: 5. OCEAN CLEANUP DONATIONS
oceanCleanup.content: Miky.ai makes biannual donations to ocean cleanup organizations and environmental foundations. These donations are made independently and do not constitute partnerships, endorsements, or joint ventures with recipient organizations.

paymentTerms.title: 6. PAYMENT TERMS AND CREDIT SYSTEM
paymentTerms.content: All payments are processed through Stripe and are non-refundable. Subscription fees are charged monthly in advance. Credit purchases are final and non-transferable. Credits do not expire but may be voided for terms violations.

userResponsibilities.title: 7. USER RESPONSIBILITIES AND PROHIBITED CONDUCT
userResponsibilities.content: Users are strictly prohibited from using the Platform for illegal, harmful, or unethical purposes; attempting to reverse engineer, hack, or exploit the AI systems; sharing account credentials or reselling Platform access.

intellectualProperty.title: 8. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS
intellectualProperty.content: All Platform content, features, and functionality are owned by Miky.ai Inc. and protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. Users retain ownership of their input but grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use input data for service provision and improvement.

limitationOfLiability.title: 9. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
limitationOfLiability.content: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, MIKY.AI INC. SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES. OUR TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID BY YOU IN THE TWELVE (12) MONTHS PRECEDING THE CLAIM.

indemnification.title: 10. INDEMNIFICATION
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Miky.ai Inc., its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising from your use of the Platform, violation of these Terms, infringement of intellectual property rights, reliance on AI-generated content, or participation in the referral program.

termination.title: 11. TERMINATION
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend accounts immediately, without prior notice, for terms violations or at our sole discretion. Upon termination, your right to use the Platform ceases, unused credits are forfeited, and these Terms remain in effect regarding prior use.

governingLaw.title: 12. GOVERNING LAW AND DISPUTE RESOLUTION
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by Delaware state law. Any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration under the American Arbitration Association Commercial Arbitration Rules. Class action lawsuits are waived.

modifications.title: 13. MODIFICATIONS
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Significant changes will be posted with 30-day notice. Continued use constitutes acceptance of modified Terms.

contact.title: 14. CONTACT INFORMATION
contact.content: For questions regarding these Terms, contact us at support@miky.ai or Neuronica, Via del Serrone 62, 47890 Repubblica di San Marino.

introduction.title: 1. INTRODUCTION AND SCOPE
introduction.content: Miky.ai Inc. ("Company," "We," "Us," "Our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, process, and disclose information about you when you use our artificial intelligence platform Miky.ai ("Platform," "Service"). This Policy applies to all users of the Platform, including visitors, registered users, subscribers, and participants in our network marketing referral program. By using our Service, you consent to the data practices described in this Policy.

keyPrinciples.title: Key Privacy Principles:
keyPrinciples.transparency: Transparency in data collection and usage
keyPrinciples.minimal: Minimal data collection necessary for service provision
keyPrinciples.security: Strong security measures for data protection

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information You Provide
personalInfo.account: Account Information: Name, email address, password, referral codes
personalInfo.payment: Payment Information: Billing address, payment method details (processed by Stripe)
personalInfo.profile: Profile Information: Subscription plan, credit balance, usage preferences
personalInfo.contact: Contact Information: Information provided through contact forms or support requests
personalInfo.referral: Referral Information: Referral network data, commission tracking, payout preferences

aiInteraction.title: 2.2 AI Interaction Data
aiInteraction.inputs: User Inputs: Messages, questions, and prompts sent to AI Specialists
aiInteraction.responses: AI Responses: Generated responses from our AI systems
aiInteraction.metadata: Interaction Metadata: Timestamps, AI persona used, credit consumption
aiInteraction.patterns: Usage Patterns: Frequency of use, preferred AI specialists, session duration
aiInteraction.performance: Performance Data: Response times, error rates, user satisfaction metrics
aiInteraction.warning: IMPORTANT: We strongly advise against sharing sensitive personal data, passwords, API keys, financial information, or confidential business data with AI Specialists.

automaticInfo.title: 2.3 Automatically Collected Information
automaticInfo.device: Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, device identifiers
automaticInfo.usage: Usage Analytics: Pages visited, features used, time spent on Platform
automaticInfo.technical: Technical Data: Cookies, local storage, server logs, error reports
automaticInfo.location: Location Data: General geographic location based on IP address

primaryService.title: 3.1 Primary Service Purposes
primaryService.content: Providing access to AI Specialists and conversation services; Processing AI requests and generating responses; Managing user accounts, subscriptions, and credit systems; Processing payments and handling billing; Providing customer support and technical assistance

aiImprovement.title: 3.2 AI System Improvement
aiImprovement.content: Improving AI response quality and accuracy; Training models to better understand user intents; Developing new AI personas and capabilities; Identifying and fixing AI system errors; Optimizing performance and response times. Note: Personal identifiers are removed or anonymized for AI training purposes.

networkMarketing.title: 3.3 Network Marketing Operations
networkMarketing.content: Managing multi-level referral networks and commission tracking; Processing referral bonuses and affiliate payouts; Preventing fraud and abuse in the referral system; Analyzing referral performance and network growth; Communicating with referral program participants

serviceProviders.title: 4.1 Service Providers
serviceProviders.content: We share information with trusted third-party service providers: Payment Processing (Stripe), Cloud Infrastructure (AWS, Google Cloud), AI Services (OpenAI), Analytics (Google Analytics, Mixpanel), Email Services (SendGrid, Mailgun), Customer Support (help desk systems)

legalRequirements.title: 4.2 Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.content: We may disclose information when required by law: Compliance with legal processes, subpoenas, or court orders; Law enforcement investigations and regulatory inquiries; Protection of intellectual property and business interests; Prevention of fraud, abuse, or illegal activities; Protection of user safety and platform security

dataSecurity.title: 5. DATA SECURITY MEASURES

technicalSafeguards.title: 5.1 Technical Safeguards
technicalSafeguards.content: Encryption: Data encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256); Access Controls: Role-based access with multi-factor authentication; Network Security: Firewalls, intrusion detection, and monitoring systems; Regular Audits: Security assessments and vulnerability testing; Secure Infrastructure: SOC 2 Type II certified cloud providers

organizationalMeasures.title: 5.2 Organizational Measures
organizationalMeasures.content: Employee training on data protection and privacy; Confidentiality agreements for all staff and contractors; Incident response procedures for data breaches; Regular security policy updates and compliance reviews; Limited access on need-to-know basis

dataSecurity.limitations: Security Limitations: While we implement industry-standard security measures, no system is 100% secure. Users are responsible for maintaining the security of their account credentials.

accountManagement.title: 6.1 Account Management
accountManagement.content: Access: View and download your personal data; Correction: Update inaccurate or incomplete information; Deletion: Request account deletion and data removal; Portability: Export your data in machine-readable format; Restriction: Limit certain data processing activities

regionalRights.title: 6.2 Regional Privacy Rights
regionalRights.ccpa: California Privacy Rights (CCPA): Right to know what personal information is collected; Right to delete personal information; Right to opt-out of sale (we do not sell personal data); Right to non-discrimination
regionalRights.gdpr: European Privacy Rights (GDPR): EU residents have rights including access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, and objection. Contact us at support@miky.ai to exercise these rights.

dataRetention.title: 7. DATA RETENTION AND DELETION
dataRetention.content: Account Data: Retained while account is active plus 7 years for legal compliance; Conversation Data: Stored for up to 2 years for service improvement; Payment Data: Retained per financial regulations (typically 7 years); Analytics Data: Aggregated data retained indefinitely; Support Data: Customer service interactions retained for 3 years. Upon account deletion or request, we will delete or anonymize personal data within 30 days.

internationalTransfers.title: 8. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS
internationalTransfers.content: Our Platform operates globally and data may be transferred to and processed in the United States and other countries. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international transfers.

childrenPrivacy.title: 9. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY
childrenPrivacy.content: Our Platform is not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

policyUpdates.title: 10. PRIVACY POLICY UPDATES
policyUpdates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Significant changes will be communicated via email or Platform notification.

contact.title: 11. CONTACT INFORMATION
contact.content: For privacy-related questions, concerns, or to exercise your rights, contact our Data Protection Officer: Email: support@miky.ai - Address: Neuronica, Via del Serrone 62, 47890 Repubblica di San Marino

introduction.title: 1. INTRODUCTION TO COOKIES
introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how Miky.ai Inc. ("Company," "We," "Us," "Our") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on our artificial intelligence platform Miky.ai ("Platform," "Service"). This policy works in conjunction with our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. By continuing to use our Platform, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
introduction.whatAreCookies: What Are Cookies? Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit websites. They help websites remember information about your visit, making your next visit easier and the site more useful.

essential.title: 2.1 Essential Cookies (Always Active)
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the Platform to function properly and cannot be disabled:
essential.authentication: Authentication Cookies: Keep you logged in and maintain session security
essential.security: Security Cookies: Protect against cross-site request forgery and other attacks
essential.loadBalancing: Load Balancing: Ensure optimal performance and prevent server overload
essential.features: Feature Toggles: Remember your platform preferences and settings
essential.credits: Credit Tracking: Monitor your credit usage and subscription status
essential.aiSession: AI Session Management: Maintain conversation context with AI Specialists
essential.legalBasis: Legal Basis: Strictly necessary for service provision (legitimate interest)

functional.title: 2.2 Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enhance your experience by remembering your preferences:
functional.language: Language Preferences: Remember your selected language and locale
functional.theme: Theme Settings: Save your preferred dark/light mode
functional.aiPreferences: AI Specialist Preferences: Remember your favorite AI personas
functional.interface: Interface Customization: Save layout and feature preferences
functional.notifications: Notification Preferences: Save your communication preferences
functional.legalBasis: Legal Basis: Legitimate interest in improving user experience

analytics.title: 2.3 Analytics and Performance Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how users interact with our Platform:
analytics.googleAnalytics: Google Analytics: Track page views, user flows, and engagement metrics
analytics.performance: Performance Monitoring: Measure page load times and error rates
analytics.featureUsage: Feature Usage: Understand which AI Specialists are most popular
analytics.conversion: Conversion Tracking: Measure subscription and referral conversions
analytics.abTesting: A/B Testing: Compare different versions of features
analytics.heatmap: Heatmap Analysis: Understand user interaction patterns
analytics.legalBasis: Legal Basis: Consent (can be opted out)

marketing.title: 2.4 Marketing and Targeting Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies support our marketing efforts and referral program:
marketing.referral: Referral Tracking: Track referral sources and attribute commissions
marketing.campaign: Campaign Attribution: Measure effectiveness of marketing campaigns
marketing.retargeting: Retargeting: Show relevant ads to previous visitors
marketing.socialMedia: Social Media Pixels: Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter conversion tracking
marketing.email: Email Campaign Tracking: Measure email marketing effectiveness
marketing.affiliate: Affiliate Management: Support our network marketing program
marketing.legalBasis: Legal Basis: Consent (can be opted out)

thirdParty.title: 2.5 Third-Party Service Cookies
thirdParty.description: External services integrated into our Platform may set their own cookies:
thirdParty.stripe: Stripe Payment Processing: Secure payment form and fraud detection
thirdParty.openai: OpenAI Services: AI conversation processing and rate limiting
thirdParty.support: Customer Support: Help desk and live chat functionality
thirdParty.cdn: CDN Providers: Content delivery and performance optimization
thirdParty.email: Email Services: SendGrid for transactional email delivery
thirdParty.security: Security Services: DDoS protection and bot detection
thirdParty.note: Note: Third-party cookies are governed by their respective privacy policies

session.title: 3.1 Session Cookies
session.description: These cookies are temporary and are deleted when you close your browser:
session.items: Authentication tokens for current session; AI conversation state and context; Shopping cart and payment process data; Temporary security tokens

persistent.title: 3.2 Persistent Cookies
persistent.description: These cookies remain on your device for specified periods:
persistent.rememberMe: Remember Me (30 days): Keep you logged in between sessions
persistent.preferences: Preferences (1 year): Language, theme, and interface settings
persistent.analytics: Analytics (2 years): Google Analytics user identification
persistent.marketing: Marketing (90 days): Campaign attribution and referral tracking
persistent.performance: Performance (6 months): Feature usage and optimization data

functionality.title: 4.1 Platform Functionality
functionality.content: Maintaining user authentication and session security; Preserving AI conversation context and history; Managing credit consumption and subscription features; Personalizing AI specialist recommendations; Optimizing platform performance and loading times

networkMarketing.title: 4.2 Network Marketing Operations
networkMarketing.content: Tracking referral sources and attributing commissions; Managing multi-level marketing network structures; Preventing fraud in the referral system; Calculating and processing affiliate payments; Analyzing referral program performance

security.title: 4.3 Security and Fraud Prevention
security.content: Detecting suspicious activity and potential threats; Preventing unauthorized access to accounts; Protecting against payment fraud and chargebacks; Identifying and blocking malicious bots; Enforcing rate limits and usage policies

cookieChoices.title: 5. YOUR COOKIE CHOICES AND CONTROLS

browserControls.title: 5.1 Browser Controls
browserControls.description: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings:
browserControls.chrome: Chrome: Settings ‚Üí Privacy and Security ‚Üí Cookies and other site data
browserControls.firefox: Firefox: Options ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Cookies and Site Data
browserControls.safari: Safari: Preferences ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Manage Website Data
browserControls.edge: Edge: Settings ‚Üí Cookies and site permissions ‚Üí Cookies and site data

platformSettings.title: 5.2 Platform Cookie Settings
platformSettings.description: You can manage cookie preferences through your account settings:
platformSettings.access: Access cookie preferences in Account Settings ‚Üí Privacy
platformSettings.toggle: Toggle analytics and marketing cookies on/off
platformSettings.view: View detailed information about cookies in use
platformSettings.download: Download a report of your cookie consent choices
platformSettings.reset: Reset all cookie preferences to defaults

cookieChoices.importantNote: Important Note: Disabling certain cookies may impact Platform functionality. Essential cookies cannot be disabled as they are required for basic service operation, user authentication, and security.

aiInteractions.title: 6. COOKIES AND AI INTERACTIONS
aiInteractions.context: Conversation Context: Maintain context across AI interactions
aiInteractions.preferences: Specialist Preferences: Remember preferred AI personas
aiInteractions.optimization: Usage Optimization: Improve AI response relevance
aiInteractions.tracking: Credit Tracking: Monitor credit consumption per interaction
aiInteractions.metrics: Performance Metrics: Measure AI response times and quality
aiInteractions.personalization: Personalization: Adapt AI behavior to user preferences
aiInteractions.protection: Privacy Protection: AI conversation data stored in cookies is anonymized and encrypted. Sensitive information shared with AI Specialists is not stored in cookies.

measures.title: 7.1 Security Measures
measures.content: Encryption: Sensitive cookie data is encrypted; Secure Flags: Cookies transmitted only over HTTPS; HttpOnly Flags: Prevent client-side script access; SameSite Attributes: Protection against CSRF attacks; Regular Rotation: Security tokens rotated frequently; Domain Restrictions: Cookies limited to appropriate domains

minimization.title: 7.2 Data Minimization
minimization.content: Only necessary data stored in cookies; Regular cleanup of expired cookies; Anonymization where possible; Shortest retention periods practical

policyUpdates.title: 8. UPDATES TO THIS COOKIE POLICY
policyUpdates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through: Email notification to registered users; Platform notification banners; Updated "Last modified" date; Cookie consent banner updates. Continued use of the Platform after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Cookie Policy.

contact.title: 9. CONTACT INFORMATION
contact.content: For questions about this Cookie Policy, cookie practices, or to exercise your rights, contact us: Email: support@miky.ai - Address: Neuronica, Via del Serrone 62, 47890 Repubblica di San Marino
